associateApprovedOrigin.description: Grants permission to associate approved origin for an existing Amazon Connect instance

associateBot.description: Grants permission to associate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance

associateCustomerProfilesDomain.description: Grants permission to associate a Customer Profiles domain for an existing Amazon Connect instance

associateDefaultVocabulary.description: Grants permission to default vocabulary for an existing Amazon Connect instance

associateInstanceStorageConfig.description: Grants permission to associate instance storage for an existing Amazon Connect instance

associateLambdaFunction.description: Grants permission to associate a Lambda function for an existing Amazon Connect instance

associateLexBot.description: Grants permission to associate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance

associatePhoneNumberContactFlow.description: Grants permission to associate contact flow resources to phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance

associateQueueQuickConnects.description: Grants permission to associate quick connects with a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

associateRoutingProfileQueues.description: Grants permission to associate queues with a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

associateSecurityKey.description: Grants permission to associate a security key for an existing Amazon Connect instance

batchAssociateAnalyticsDataSet.description: Grants permission to grant access and to associate the datasets with the specified AWS account

batchDisassociateAnalyticsDataSet.description: Grants permission to revoke access and to disassociate the datasets with the specified AWS account

claimPhoneNumber.description: Grants permission to claim phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance or traffic distribution group

createAgentStatus.description: Grants permission to create agent status in an Amazon Connect instance

createContactFlow.description: Grants permission to create a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

createContactFlowModule.description: Grants permission to create a contact flow module in an Amazon Connect instance

createHoursOfOperation.description: Grants permission to create hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

createInstance.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon Connect instance

createIntegrationAssociation.description: Grants permission to create an integration association with an Amazon Connect instance

createQueue.description: Grants permission to create a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

createQuickConnect.description: Grants permission to create a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

createRoutingProfile.description: Grants permission to create a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

createSecurityProfile.description: Grants permission to create a security profile for the specified Amazon Connect instance

createTaskTemplate.description: Grants permission to create a task template in an Amazon Connect instance

createTrafficDistributionGroup.description: Grants permission to create a traffic distribution group

createUseCase.description: Grants permission to create a use case for an integration association

createUser.description: Grants permission to create a user for the specified Amazon Connect instance

createUserHierarchyGroup.description: Grants permission to create a user hierarchy group in an Amazon Connect instance

createVocabulary.description: Grants permission to create a vocabulary in an Amazon Connect instance

deleteContactFlow.description: Grants permission to delete a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

deleteContactFlowModule.description: Grants permission to delete a contact flow module in an Amazon Connect instance

deleteHoursOfOperation.description: Grants permission to delete hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

deleteInstance.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Connect instance. When you remove an instance, the link to an existing AWS directory is also removed

deleteIntegrationAssociation.description: Grants permission to delete an integration association from an Amazon Connect instance. The association must not have any use cases associated with it

deleteQuickConnect.description: Grants permission to delete a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

deleteSecurityProfile.description: Grants permission to delete a security profile in an Amazon Connect instance

deleteTaskTemplate.description: Grants permission to delete a task template in an Amazon Connect instance

deleteTrafficDistributionGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a traffic distribution group

deleteUseCase.description: Grants permission to delete a use case from an integration association

deleteUser.description: Grants permission to delete a user in an Amazon Connect instance

deleteUserHierarchyGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a user hierarchy group in an Amazon Connect instance

deleteVocabulary.description: Grants permission to delete a vocabulary in an Amazon Connect instance

describeAgentStatus.description: Grants permission to describe agent status in an Amazon Connect instance

describeContact.description: Grants permission to describe a contact in an Amazon Connect instance

describeContactFlow.description: Grants permission to describe a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

describeContactFlowModule.description: Grants permission to describe a contact flow module in an Amazon Connect instance

describeHoursOfOperation.description: Grants permission to describe hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

describeInstance.description: Grants permission to view details of an Amazon Connect instance and is also required to create an instance

describeInstanceAttribute.description: Grants permission to view the attribute details of an existing Amazon Connect instance

describeInstanceStorageConfig.description: Grants permission to view the instance storage configuration for an existing Amazon Connect instance

describePhoneNumber.description: Grants permission to describe phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance or traffic distribution group

describeQueue.description: Grants permission to describe a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

describeQuickConnect.description: Grants permission to describe a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

describeRoutingProfile.description: Grants permission to describe a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

describeTrafficDistributionGroup.description: Grants permission to describe a traffic distribution group

describeUser.description: Grants permission to describe a user in an Amazon Connect instance

describeUserHierarchyGroup.description: Grants permission to describe a hierarchy group for an Amazon Connect instance

describeUserHierarchyStructure.description: Grants permission to describe the hierarchy structure for an Amazon Connect instance

describeVocabulary.description: Grants permission to describe a vocabulary in an Amazon Connect instance

disassociateApprovedOrigin.description: Grants permission to disassociate approved origin for an existing Amazon Connect instance

disassociateBot.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance

disassociateCustomerProfilesDomain.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Customer Profiles domain for an existing Amazon Connect instance

disassociateInstanceStorageConfig.description: Grants permission to disassociate instance storage for an existing Amazon Connect instance

disassociateLambdaFunction.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Lambda function for an existing Amazon Connect instance

disassociateLexBot.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Lex bot for an existing Amazon Connect instance

disassociatePhoneNumberContactFlow.description: Grants permission to disassociate contact flow resources from phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance

disassociateQueueQuickConnects.description: Grants permission to disassociate quick connects from a queue in an Amazon Connect instance

disassociateRoutingProfileQueues.description: Grants permission to disassociate queues from a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

disassociateSecurityKey.description: Grants permission to disassociate the security key for an existing Amazon Connect instance

getContactAttributes.description: Grants permission to retrieve the contact attributes for the specified contact

getCurrentMetricData.description: Grants permission to retrieve current metric data for the queues in an Amazon Connect instance

getCurrentUserData.description: Grants permission to retrieve current user data in an Amazon Connect instance

getFederationToken.description: Grants permission to federate into an Amazon Connect instance when using SAML-based authentication for identity management

getFederationTokens.description: Grants permission to federate into an Amazon Connect instance (Log in for emergency access functionality in the Amazon Connect console)

getMetricData.description: Grants permission to retrieve historical metric data for queues in an Amazon Connect instance

getTaskTemplate.description: Grants permission to get details about specified task template in an Amazon Connect instance

getTrafficDistribution.description: Grants permission to read traffic distribution for a traffic distribution group

listAgentStatuses.description: Grants permission to list agent statuses in an Amazon Connect instance

listApprovedOrigins.description: Grants permission to view approved origins of an existing Amazon Connect instance

listBots.description: Grants permission to view the Lex bots of an existing Amazon Connect instance

listContactFlowModules.description: Grants permission to list contact flow module resources in an Amazon Connect instance

listContactFlows.description: Grants permission to list contact flow resources in an Amazon Connect instance

listContactReferences.description: Grants permission to list references associated with a contact in an Amazon Connect instance

listDefaultVocabularies.description: Grants permission to list default vocabularies associated with a Amazon Connect instance

listHoursOfOperations.description: Grants permission to list hours of operation resources in an Amazon Connect instance

listInstanceAttributes.description: Grants permission to view the attributes of an existing Amazon Connect instance

listInstanceStorageConfigs.description: Grants permission to view storage configurations of an existing Amazon Connect instance

listInstances.description: Grants permission to view the Amazon Connect instances associated with an AWS account

listIntegrationAssociations.description: Grants permission to list summary information about the integration associations for the specified Amazon Connect instance

listLambdaFunctions.description: Grants permission to view the Lambda functions of an existing Amazon Connect instance

listLexBots.description: Grants permission to view the Lex bots of an existing Amazon Connect instance

listPhoneNumbers.description: Grants permission to list phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance

listPrompts.description: Grants permission to list prompt resources in an Amazon Connect instance

listQuickConnects.description: Grants permission to list quick connect resources in an Amazon Connect instance

listRealtimeContactAnalysisSegments.description: Grants permission to list the analysis segments for a real-time analysis session

listRoutingProfileQueues.description: Grants permission to list queue resources in a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

listRoutingProfiles.description: Grants permission to list routing profile resources in an Amazon Connect instance

listSecurityKeys.description: Grants permission to view the security keys of an existing Amazon Connect instance

listSecurityProfilePermissions.description: Grants permission to list permissions associated with security profile in an Amazon Connect instance

listTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an Amazon Connect resource

listTaskTemplates.description: Grants permission to list task template resources in an Amazon Connect instance

listTrafficDistributionGroups.description: Grants permission to list traffic distribution groups

listUseCases.description: Grants permission to list the use cases of an integration association

listUserHierarchyGroups.description: Grants permission to list the hierarchy group resources in an Amazon Connect instance

listUsers.description: Grants permission to list user resources in an Amazon Connect instance

putUserStatus.description: Grants permission to switch User Status in an Amazon Connect instance

releasePhoneNumber.description: Grants permission to release phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance

replicateInstance.description: Grants permission to create a replica of an Amazon Connect instance

resumeContactRecording.description: Grants permission to resume recording for the specified contact

searchAvailablePhoneNumbers.description: Grants permission to search phone number resources in an Amazon Connect instance or traffic distribution group

searchQueues.description: Grants permission to search queue resources in an Amazon Connect instance

searchRoutingProfiles.description: Grants permission to search routing profile resources in an Amazon Connect instance

searchUsers.description: Grants permission to search user resources in an Amazon Connect instance

searchVocabularies.description: Grants permission to search vocabularies in a Amazon Connect instance

startChatContact.description: Grants permission to initiate a chat using the Amazon Connect API

startContactRecording.description: Grants permission to start recording for the specified contact

startContactStreaming.description: Grants permission to start chat streaming using the Amazon Connect API

startOutboundVoiceContact.description: Grants permission to initiate outbound calls using the Amazon Connect API

startTaskContact.description: Grants permission to initiate a task using the Amazon Connect API

stopContact.description: Grants permission to stop contacts that were initiated using the Amazon Connect API. If you use this operation on an active contact the contact ends, even if the agent is active on a call with a customer

stopContactRecording.description: Grants permission to stop recording for the specified contact

stopContactStreaming.description: Grants permission to stop chat streaming using the Amazon Connect API

suspendContactRecording.description: Grants permission to suspend recording for the specified contact

tagResource.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon Connect resource

transferContact.description: Grants permission to transfer the contact to another queue or agent

untagResource.description: Grants permission to untag an Amazon Connect resource

updateAgentStatus.description: Grants permission to update agent status in an Amazon Connect instance

updateContact.description: Grants permission to update a contact in an Amazon Connect instance

updateContactAttributes.description: Grants permission to create or update the contact attributes associated with the specified contact

updateContactFlowContent.description: Grants permission to update contact flow content in an Amazon Connect instance

updateContactFlowName.description: Grants permission to update the name and description of a contact flow in an Amazon Connect instance

updateContactSchedule.description: Grants permission to update the schedule of a contact that is already scheduled in an Amazon Connect instance

updateHoursOfOperation.description: Grants permission to update hours of operation in an Amazon Connect instance

updateInstanceAttribute.description: Grants permission to update the attribute for an existing Amazon Connect instance

updateQuickConnectConfig.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of a quick connect in an Amazon Connect instance

updateQuickConnectName.description: Grants permission to update a quick connect name and description in an Amazon Connect instance

updateRoutingProfileConcurrency.description: Grants permission to update the concurrency in a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

updateRoutingProfileDefaultOutboundQueue.description: Grants permission to update the outbound queue in a routing profile in an Amazon Connect instance

updateTaskTemplate.description: Grants permission to update task template belonging to a Amazon Connect instance

updateTrafficDistribution.description: Grants permission to update traffic distribution for a traffic distribution group

updateUserHierarchy.description: Grants permission to update a hierarchy group for a user in an Amazon Connect instance

updatedescribeContent.description: Grants permission to update contact flow module content in an Amazon Connect instance
